author: SlovenianBrick101
title: LEGO Creator 40252: A great way to go to the beach
review:
Hello everybody,

Today I am going to review a exclusive LEGO Creator set 40252 VW Beetle.I bought it few days ago in my local LEGO Store.So let us start. :)

Box and instructions

So you get that LEGO Promotional box like 40220 London Bus.It is nice small box.When you open it you get some bags (it camed like that to me some contain only one bag) sticker sheet and instruction booklet.So let us start building it.

Pieces

In this set you get 91 pcs.There are not any special pcs, but I am glad that they used this kind of wheels.Good job LEGO. :)

Build

The build is easy and quick.So let us move to the review.

The final product

I really like it.It has a liitle diffrent shape then that 1000+ pcs set, but it is solid.You get a lot of stickers that is what I do not like.It is the same problem like on the London Bus. :(  Then I love these wheels.They included and this nice surboard.There are no minifigures in this set, but it is in a minifigure scale ( kind off).

Veridict

I love this set, the only thing that is bodering me is a lot and I mean A LOT of stickers, please LEGO these are exclusive sets, so then made them with prints.I like the shape and everything so I do not have anything else to say about this set.

That is all for this review.Next review will be: LEGO Creator Blue Express Train.

Your SlovenianBrick101 :)
